title: Chapter VI - Forms For Use In Courts Exercising Criminal Jurisdiction
content:
Chapter VI - Forms For Use In Courts Exercising Criminal Jurisdiction

State Regulations

Form Criminal Form 1 - Order of protection-family offense

Form Criminal Form 2 - Order of protection-nonfamily offenses (not involving victims of domestic violence)

Form 5a - Nav. L. chemical tests-order

Form Criminal Form 6 - Notice of conviction or youthful offender adjudication

Form 6 - V.T.L. chemical tests-affidavit, version 2

Form 6a - Nav. L. chemical tests-affidavit

Form 7 - Bail bond with justifying affidavit (defendant obligor), version 2

Form 8 - Bail bond with justifying affidavit (third party obligor)

Form 9 - Conditions of probation

Form 10 - Juror questionnaire

Form 11 - Declaration of delinquency, version 2

Form 12 - Order to appear at violation of probation hearing, version 2

Form 13 - Judicial reprimand of probationer

Form 14a - Enlargement of conditions of probation

Form 14b - Order enlarging conditions of probation

Form 15 - Elimination or relaxation of conditions of probation

Form 16a - Order for psychiatric examination

Form 16-b - Examination report, version 2

Form 16-c - Designation of psychiatric examiners

Form 16-d - Temporary order of observation

Form 16-e - Final order of observation and dismissal of accusatory instrument

Form 16-f - Order of commitment

Form 16-g - Designation of institution for custody of defendant

Form 16-h - Application for order of retention

Form 16-I - Notice to defendant of application for order of retention

Form 16-j - Order of retention

Form 16-k - Notification of fitness to proceed

Form 16-l - Order of remand

Form 16-m - Certification of custody

Form 16-n - Notice of dismissal of indictment

Application for an order to terminate or sever lease or rental agreement

Order to terminate or sever lease or rental agreement

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
